languages.text: "Что это за уныние? Мне гораздо больше нравится Арджента, которая бросается на проблемы с болтером наперевес".

traits.locale_text: "Что это за уныние? Мне гораздо больше нравится Арджента, которая бросается на проблемы с болтером наперевес".

languages.text: "Where has this dejection come from? I much prefer the Argenta who tackles her problems with her bolter at the ready."
languages.original_text: "Что это за уныние? Мне гораздо больше нравится Арджента, которая бросается на проблемы с болтером наперевес".

traits.locale_text: "What is with this dejection? I much prefer the Argenta who tackles her problems with her bolter at the ready."
"What is with this dejection? I much prefer the Argenta who tackles her problems with her bolter at the ready."
"Where has this dejection come from? I much prefer the Argenta who tackles her problems with her bolter at the ready."
"Where has this dejection come from? I much prefer the Argenta who tackles her problems with her bolter at the ready."
"Where has this dejection come from? I much prefer the Argenta who tackles her problems with her bolter at the ready."

languages.text: 「この落胆はどこからきたものだ？問題をボルターですぐに片付けるアルジェンタの方が{mf|俺|私}にはずっといい」
languages.original_text: "Where has this dejection come from? I much prefer the Argenta who tackles her problems with her bolter at the ready."

traits.locale_text: 「この落胆はどこからきたものだ？問題をボルターですぐに片付けるアルジェンタの方が{mf|俺|私}にはずっといい」

languages.text: “你怎么突然泄了气？我更喜欢那个无论遇到什么问题，都会立刻抄起爆矢枪的阿洁塔。”
languages.original_text: "Where has this dejection come from? I much prefer the Argenta who tackles her problems with her bolter at the ready."

traits.locale_text: “你怎么突然泄了气？我更喜欢那个无论遇到什么问题，都会立刻抄起爆矢枪的阿洁塔。”

languages.text: « Épargnez-moi vos discours larmoyants. Je préfère de loin l'Argenta qui règle ses problèmes à coups de bolter. »
languages.original_text: "Where has this dejection come from? I much prefer the Argenta who tackles her problems with her bolter at the ready."

traits.locale_text: « Épargnez-moi vos discours larmoyants. Je préfère de loin l'Argenta qui règle ses problèmes à coups de bolter. »

languages.text: «¿De dónde sale ese abatimiento? Prefiero ver a la Argenta que se enfrenta a los problemas bólter en mano».
languages.original_text: "Where has this dejection come from? I much prefer the Argenta who tackles her problems with her bolter at the ready."

traits.locale_text: «¿De dónde sale ese abatimiento? Prefiero ver a la Argenta que se enfrenta a los problemas bólter en mano».

languages.text: "Woher kommt diese Mutlosigkeit? Die Argenta, die ihre Probleme mit dem Bolter im Anschlag löst, ist mir viel lieber."
languages.original_text: "Where has this dejection come from? I much prefer the Argenta who tackles her problems with her bolter at the ready."

traits.locale_text: "Woher kommt diese Mutlosigkeit? Die Argenta, die ihre Probleme mit dem Bolter im Anschlag löst, ist mir viel lieber."

languages.text: "Bu karamsarlık da nereden çıktı? Ben, bulonatarını hazırda bekleterek sorunlarını çözen Argenta'yı tercih ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "Where has this dejection come from? I much prefer the Argenta who tackles her problems with her bolter at the ready."

traits.locale_text: "Bu karamsarlık da nereden çıktı? Ben, bulonatarını hazırda bekleterek sorunlarını çözen Argenta'yı tercih ediyorum."
